item.description:
I know its Easter, but my plans for Sunday got inadvertantly cancelled and I stumbled across this restaurant yesterday. Its supposed to be very authentic and I've been craving Indian. So, if you don't have plans Sunday evening, or you're not done celebrating, come on out an meet for dinner!

The restaurant is 5 minutes from the Havard Ave station on the green line and there is parking across the street.

Here is the web site for menu, reviews, etc...
http://www.grainnsalt...
item.how_to_find_us: The reservation is in my name "Noelle"

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner at Indian/Pakistani Restaurant
